name: merge(with:_:)
desc: Combines elements from this publisher with those from two other publishers, delivering an interleaved sequence of elements.
declaration: func merge<B, C>(with b: B, _ c: C) -> Publishers.Merge3<Self, B, C> where B : Publisher, C : Publisher, Self.Failure == B.Failure, Self.Output == B.Output, B.Failure == C.Failure, B.Output == C.Output
